Products: It's snow. Not the nice, thick, crunchy kind, though... more the disgustingly wet, slushy kind... Guess we can make stuff from it.

Project Part #12. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.
Power Usage: 1500-2500 MW (2000 MW average).

Growth is the metric by which we measure success.
Controls AIs and keeps them from evolving in malicious ways. Super advanced electronics.
Used to make products that require high heat conduction or a high specific strength. Thin, lightweight, and highly durable.

Translates organic chemicals into readable alien genetic information.
Used for researching alien organisms.

Go the extra kilometer! Knowledge is power, and power is just efficiency with fewer steps. Depositing Alien DNA Capsules in the AWESOME Sink provides FICSIT with knowledge, and pioneers with Coupons.

Ground-up Alien Remains in a neat little package.
Used for medical purposes and to research alien organisms.
Dissolved Alumina, extracted from Bauxite. Can be further refined into Aluminum Scrap for Aluminum Ingot production.
A versatile container cast from Aluminum Ingots.

Smelted from Aluminum Scrap, which is refined from Alumina Solution.
Used to produce specialized aluminum-based parts.
Refined from Alumina. Can be smelted into Aluminum Ingots for industrial usage.

A large amount of force is required for the Warp Drives to activate, so sticking them to rockets was the logical next step. Additionally, results improved immensely when the observers were further removed from the Warp Drives upon activation.
Primarily used as fuel for Drones and vehicles.
Used to produce Alumina, which can be further refined into the Aluminum Scrap required to produce Aluminum Ingots.

Consumable

Eat to restore half a health segment.

Project Part #10. Ship via the Space Elevator to complete phases of Project Assembly.

Years ahead of the competition, this top-of-the-line 3D printer is used for the production of synthetic biological resources.

Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use it for power.
Biomass is much more energy-efficient than raw biological matter.
An explosive powder that is commonly used to produce simple explosives.

An exoskeleton for the lower legs that assists movement, allowing pioneers to sprint faster and jump higher.
Also dampens the impact of landing.
Again, used for making FICSMAS Decorations.
A strange slug radiating an unknown weak power.

Used for crafting.
Primarily used to build Power Lines.

A delicious Candy Cane to be enjoyed during the FICSMAS Holidays. 
*Disclaimer: Not for consumption...
A heavy, delicious self-defense weapon for use at melee range.
Smelted from Caterium Ore. Primarily used for advanced electronics.
Smelted into Caterium Ingots, which are primarily used for advanced electronics.

Clears an area of flora that is too difficult to remove by hand.

Fuel: Biofuel
Advanced electronics that have a plethora of different uses.
Detonates into multiple smaller explosions. Practical for clearing out large areas of vegetation and other inconveniences.
Mainly used as fuel for vehicles & Coal-Powered Generators, or in Steel production.
A much more efficient alternative to Coal. Used as fuel for vehicles and Coal-Powered Generators.
A complex logic machine that is used to control advanced behavior in other machines.

Used for building.
Good for stable Foundations.
Keeps advanced parts and buildings from exceeding efficient temperature levels.
Still used for making FICSMAS Decorations.
Used for crafting the most basic parts.

Used for crafting.
A basic resource primarily used for electricity.

Ground-up Copper Ingots.
The high natural density of Copper, combined with the granularity of the powder, makes this part perfect for producing Nuclear Pasta in the Particle Accelerator.

Used for crafting.
Primarily used for Pipelines due to its high corrosion resistance.
Refined into all kinds of Oil-based resources, like Fuel and Plastic.
An electronic oscillator circuit that uses the mechanical resonance of a vibrating crystal to create an electrical signal with a precise frequency.

Concentrated Dark Matter Residue that is isolated within a crystalline vessel. This form of containment allows for utilising Dark Matter reliably in other production processes.

Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Produced as a by-product of Quantum Encoding processes and alternatively generated in the Converter.

Various fields of science are still debating the nature and properties of Dark Matter. Meanwhile, FICSIT has found several applications for it in space-time manipulation.

Synthetic Diamonds produced by exposing Coal to extreme heat and pressure.

Used in the production of Time Crystals and Dark Matter Crystals.

Power Usage: 250-750 MW (500 MW average).

Silica dissolved in Water, produced as part of the alternative refinement of Raw Quartz.
The Silica can be extracted from the Water to complete the refinement process.
Used to package fluids for transportation.
Used to package gases and volatile liquids for transportation.

Simultaneously utilizes the compressive strength of concrete and the tensile strength of steel.
Mostly used as a stable base for constructing buildings.

Plutonium Pellets encased in concrete.
Used to produce Plutonium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.

Used to produce Uranium Fuel Rods for Nuclear Power production. Made from Uranium Ore.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Excited Photonic Matter is essential for all production processes in the Quantum Encoder.

Formed in the Converter by inducing intense photon interactions through exposure to SAM in a high-energy environment.
Explodes on impact, dealing heavy damage.

Used to craft equipment.
Flexible but durable fabric.

The one and only FICSIT Factory Cart™.
Now with special FICSIT-Foundation-only Grip Wheels, for an even smoother and faster factory floor experience!
Fireworks are produced from random ingredients. Primarily used for having a good time.

Produced by reconstructing other metals on a molecular level using Strange Alien Matter.

Synthesized by FICSIT to be the perfect construction material, and used in the most high-end processes.
The Ficsite Trigon, made from Ficsite Ingots, is perfectly shaped for all construction challenges. It's performance is so exceptional, it basically solved structural engineering.
A fancy Bow. Maybe someone could wear this? You certainly can't! What you can do is make parts and decorations from it. Probably.
A decoration used to make decorations. Its use cases are questionable.

Special FICSMAS buildings and parts can be obtained and produced from this FICSIT Holiday present.

*Watch the sky for deliveries from orbit!
All the FICSMAS Ornaments smashed together to make even more FICSMAS Decorations!
A special Tree Branch used to produce parts and buildings during the FICSMAS Event.
This special FICSMAS Star signifies FICSIT's productivity all across the universe. It also signifies the fact that you have nearly completed the Holiday Event, so it's time to get back to work.

Usage and production of this material is strictly prohibited. On Earth, that is. There are no rules in space, only efficiency. 

Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Used as fuel for Nuclear Power Plants.
The power source that put FICSIT on the map. Literally. The crater is still there.

Caution: Moderately Radioactive.
Can be used as-is to generate power, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.
A corrosion-resistant, nitride-hardened, highly-robust-yet-lightweight modular frame.
Filters out toxins and pollutants from the air when used with a Gas Mask.

Allows pioneers to breathe normally in toxic gas-filled areas.
Consumes Gas Filters from the pioneer's inventory when in use.
Creates a deadly gas cloud instead of a regular explosion.

The one and only Golden FICSIT Factory Cart™

You have now officially ascended. 
Go forth now, Master of Spaghetti, God of the Factory, Sinker of Cups, Employee of the Planet... travel in STYLE!

The shell-like remains of an alien... thing.
Used for MAM research.

Shields pioneers from the adverse effects of radiation. 
Consumes Iodine-Infused Filters from the pioneer's inventory when worn in radioactive areas.
A by-product of Plastic and Rubber production. Can be further refined into Fuel and Petroleum Coke.
Connects multiple cables and wires in a very efficient way. Uses a standard pattern, so it has many varied applications.

The carapace of an alien Hog creature.
Used for MAM research.

The bullet guidance system built into this ammunition allows it to accurately hit any target within the reticle area.
Especially useful when dealing with agile threats, or for pioneers who can't be bothered to aim properly.

Power Consumption: 100 MW

Allows pioneers to move vertically and hover in mid-air to improve building efficiency and factory traversal. Wirelessly connects to nearby power connections, such as Power Poles and Buildings, for power consumption.

Slow-Fall: Hold {PlayerMovement_Jump} after losing connection mid-air.
Disable Hoverpack: Double tap {PlayerMovement_Crouch} while hovering.
Absorbs radioactive particles when used with the Hazmat Suit.

Fuel that has been ionized, allowing it to deliver incredible output.
Can be used as-is to power Fuel-Powered Generators, or packaged to be used as fuel for vehicles or the Jetpack.

Used for crafting the most basic parts.

Used for crafting.
The most essential basic resource.

Used for crafting.
One of the most basic parts.

Used for crafting.

Allows pioneers to travel through the air with increased control.

Fuel is automatically consumed from the pioneer's inventory to refill the Jetpack while on the ground.
Different fuel types can be used and provide different levels of Jetpack efficiency. The preferred fuel type will be used if available, and can be set in the equipment inventory.

Primarily used as fuel.
Biomass Burners and vehicles can use Leaves for power.

Used for crafting.

These modular generators use superconducting magnets and vast amounts of electricity to produce a powerful and easily expandable magnetic field.

Fully restores health when used.

The FICSIT Medicinal Inhaler can be produced from a variety of different ingredients.
A weird alien phenomenon. While the sphere appears liquid, it behaves like a solid and does not have any detectable mass. It seems to somehow interact with and have awareness of its environment.

Used for crafting.
A multipurpose building block.
Creates a mechanical force that is used to move things from machines to vehicles.

Used for crafting.

The Neural-Quantum Processor utilizes a combination of neural network architecture and quantum computing techniques to achieve unprecedented performance. This technology has enabled some of FICSIT's biggest advancements in artificial intelligence and relativistic engineering.
Produced when Nitrogen Gas reacts with Water. Its high corrosiveness and oxidizing properties make it an excellent choice for refinement and fuel production processes.
Has a variety of uses, including metallurgy, cooling, and Nitric Acid production. On MASSAGE-2 (AB)b, it can be extracted from underground gas wells.
A simple explosive, useful for clearing boulders, vegetation, and other obstacles.
A remote-control device used to handle and detonate Nobelisks.

The Uranium-238 isotope is non-fissile, meaning it cannot be used for nuclear fission. It can, however, be converted into fissile Plutonium in the Particle Accelerator.

Caution: Mildly Radioactive.

Power Usage: 500-1500 MW (1000 MW average).

Nuclear Pasta is extremely dense degenerate matter, formed when extreme pressure forces protons and electrons together into neutrons. It is theorized to exist naturally within the crust of neutron stars.

Uses a nuclear fission reaction to generate a massive explosion.
WARNING: Ensure all FICSIT property is clear of the blast zone before detonation.
Scans the area for a selected item. Beeps at a rate proportional to proximity and direction.
Alumina Solution, packaged for alternative transport.
Fuel, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles and the Jetpack.
Heavy Oil Residue, packaged for alternative transport. Can be used as fuel for vehicles.

Must be stored in a safe location. Handle with caution.

The SAM Fluctuator is able to regulate and direct the behaviour of Reanimated SAM through the application of electric charges with varying frequencies.
This control facilitates technologies such as matter-to-energy conversion and spatiotemporal matter manipulation.

Used for crafting.

Fractures when shot, launching deadly debris with wide spread but limited range.

Uses extreme heat to produce the high-pressure plasma required to get Project Assembly into motion.

Lightweight, compact, and volatile. These rounds provide extreme capacity and rate of fire at the cost of accuracy.

Provides faster traversal of factories by allowing pioneers to zip along Power lines.
Activate the Zipline and aim at a nearby Power Line to connect to it.
Manufacturers:
Crafts 2 parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding component parts in via Conveyor Belts connected to the input ports. The resulting parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.

Blends fluids together or combines them with solid parts in a wide variety of processes.
Head Lift: 10 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Has both Conveyor Belt and Pipeline input and output ports.

Crafts 1 part into another part.

Can be automated by feeding component parts in via a Conveyor Belt connected to the input port. The resulting parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.

The Converter harnesses Reanimated SAM to enable precise matter and energy transmutation.

Warning: Power usage is very high and unstable.

Allows you to manually craft a wide range of different parts. 
These parts can then be used to construct various factory buildings, vehicles, and equipment.

Smelts 2 resources into alloy ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore in via Conveyor Belts connected to the input ports. The resulting ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.

Crafts 3 or 4 parts into another part.

Can be automated by feeding component parts in via Conveyor Belts connected to the input ports. The resulting parts can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.

Packages and unpackages fluids.
Head Lift: 10 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both Conveyor Belt and Pipeline input and output ports so that a wide range of recipes can be automated.

Uses electromagnetic fields to propel particles to very high speeds and energies. The specific design allows for a variety of processes, including matter generation and conversion.

Warning: Power usage is extremely high and unstable, and varies per recipe.

The Quantum Encoder uses Excited Photonic Matter to produce the most complex of parts, controlling development up to the quantum level.

Warning: Power usage is extremely high and unstable.

Refines fluid and/or solid parts into other parts.
Head Lift: 10 m
(Allows fluids to be transported 10 meters upwards.)

Contains both Conveyor Belt and Pipeline input and output ports so that a wide range of recipes can be automated.

Smelts ore into ingots.

Can be automated by feeding ore in via a Conveyor Belt connected to the input port. The resulting ingots can be automatically extracted by connecting a Conveyor Belt to the output port.
